channel.title: Workshop Issue
channel.description: There are a few problems with the workshop. Any addon that involves new sound effects (Like any added Vox messages) don't have sound. This could be a problem on my end, but that being said, the workshop also has caused problems for others (Specifically the Hazard Course mod cannot be uploaded to the workshop for a number of reasons).

item.title: Workshop Issue
item.dc:creator: KevinJRattman
item.description:
I think in the description of the VOX mod you are trying to download would say to enter a console command to actually play the sound.

This shouldnt be the case though. Devs should fix it but I have not heard from them since. Last time I asked they said… nothing. But Im sure they are.

Workshop do indeed have too much problems in its current state. About Hazard Course devs said they will fix this.

About cubemaps, Im also having similar problems but in different manner. Cubemaps work perfectly fine on my end but when I gove the map file to others for testing, on one tester’s end cubemap was not working correctly. It was like buzzing all over the place (if thats even correct word). I also tried the same thing by putting it up on workshop but same. Not sure why that happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Workshop Issue
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Also, uploading to the workshop from a “staging” folder in the main “bms” directory seems to be destroying my cubemaps. Is anyone else experiencing this problem, and is there a way around it?

Read full topic

item.title: Workshop Issue

item.description:
There are a few problems with the workshop. Any addon that involves new sound effects (Like any added Vox messages) don’t have sound.
